text:
The endpoint `/crm/v3/lists/{listId}/memberships/join-order`  that is talked about on the Overviews tab is not listed in the Endpoints tab. So I’m not sure what the difference is between this endpoint and the `/crm/v3/lists/:listId/memberships` is or the advantage of one over the other.

I’m trying to see the best way to get a list of contact members in a list and specific properties. From what I’m reading it seems like I now need to do two calls. GET membership, then POST Object (0-1) Search

Hey Justin - will look into the docs. Regarding the difference in the endpoints, the former returns objects in the order that they joined the list and the latter returns them in order of their object ID.

The list endpoints will just provide the object IDs, if you need object properties then you will need to use some other API to fetch properties for the objects (such as object search).
